statements: SELECT * FROM FeedbackSurveys;
SELECT survey_id, survey_rating, survey_comment FROM FeedbackSurveys WHERE survey_rating > 3;
SELECT survey_id, survey_rating FROM FeedbackSurveys ORDER BY survey_rating DESC;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date FROM FeedbackSurveys WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_id, survey_rating, survey_comment FROM FeedbackSurveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, survey_rating, survey_comment FROM FeedbackSurveys WHERE survey_rating > 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_rating, survey_date FROM FeedbackSurveys WHERE survey_rating < 2 ORDER BY survey_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT survey_id, survey_rating, survey_date FROM FeedbackSurveys WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND survey_rating >= 4 ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 2
SELECT survey_id, survey_comment FROM FeedbackSurveys WHERE survey_comment LIKE '%excellent%' AND survey_rating > 4 ORDER BY survey_date LIMIT 4
SELECT * FROM FeedbackSurveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY survey_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM FeedbackSurveys;
SELECT customer_id, survey_date, satisfaction_level FROM FeedbackSurveys;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date, satisfaction_level, comments FROM FeedbackSurveys ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date, satisfaction_level, comments FROM FeedbackSurveys WHERE satisfaction_level > 4;
SELECT response_id, survey_id, response_text FROM SurveyResponses ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackSurveys WHERE satisfaction_level > 4 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date FROM FeedbackSurveys WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackSurveys JOIN SurveyResponses ON FeedbackSurveys.survey_id = SurveyResponses.survey_id WHERE SurveyResponses.response_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(response_id) AS num_responses FROM FeedbackSurveys LEFT JOIN SurveyResponses ON FeedbackSurveys.survey_id = SurveyResponses.survey_id GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_level) AS avg_satisfaction FROM FeedbackSurveys GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(satisfaction_level) > 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey WHERE service_rating > 4;
SELECT customer_name, service_rating FROM feedback_survey WHERE survey_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT customer_name, response_text FROM feedback_survey JOIN customer_feedback ON feedback_survey.survey_id = customer_feedback.survey_id JOIN support_response ON customer_feedback.feedback_id = support_response.feedback_id;
SELECT survey_id, customer_name, service_rating FROM feedback_survey ORDER BY service_rating DESC, survey_id ASC;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, customer_name, service_rating FROM feedback_survey WHERE service_rating >= 4;
SELECT feedback_id, survey_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT response_id, feedback_id, response_text, response_date FROM support_response ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, customer_name, service_rating FROM feedback_survey WHERE service_rating < 3;
SELECT feedback_id, survey_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM Survey ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT question_text FROM Question WHERE survey_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, response_text, response_date FROM Customer c JOIN Response r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, survey_name FROM Survey WHERE survey_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Question WHERE survey_id = 1 ORDER BY question_id ASC;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM Response WHERE customer_id = 2 AND question_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_details;
SELECT survey_id, feedback FROM feedback_surveys WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agent_name, department FROM support_agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM feedback_ratings GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT response_id, response, response_date FROM customer_responses WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM feedback_surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, feedback FROM feedback_surveys WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT c.customer_name, f.feedback FROM customer_details c JOIN feedback_surveys f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id WHERE f.rating > 4;

SELECT s.survey_id, c.customer_name, r.rating FROM feedback_surveys s JOIN customer_details c ON s.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN feedback_ratings r ON s.survey_id = r.survey_id WHERE r.rating < 3 ORDER BY s.survey_id DESC;

SELECT a.agent_name, a.department, COUNT(r.rating) AS total_ratings FROM support_agents a LEFT JOIN feedback_ratings r ON a.agent_id = r.customer_id GROUP BY a.agent_name, a.department ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;
